title: The Human Chair
description:
This is one of the oneshot that is in the Junji Ito Best of Best: Story Story Collection.

↓ NOTES ↓
Huge thanks to LuCaz for uploading this to Nyaa.si!
Nyaa.si link: https://nyaa.si/view/1272311
